author: USA TODAY, Lindsay Schnell, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: US death toll tops 2,500; Trump continues social distancing rules; Liberty University pushes back against NYT
description: President Trump extends social distancing guidelines until April 30 as US death count nears 2,500 and Dow Jones braces for a rough week.
content:
We answer the often searched question: "What are the symptoms of coronavirus versus the flu?"
